attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore a Sir
attributes.additional_details: Ensure he receives a Knighthood and full recognition from the Queen and country!  What a hero!
attributes.background: Given the heroic efforts of Captain Tom Moore, his service to the country and more recently the NHS we would like for him to receive a knighthood

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
